name: Hohm Energy
description: Hohm helps homeowners and businesses to go solar with accredited solar installers, product suppliers and embedded solar finance in just a few clicks. We are evolving the solar purchasing experience for our clients by using scalable technology that seamlessly manages your entire solar journey. Visit our website for more info or to generate a proposal for your solar requirements.
slogan: We help end-consumers to go solar with accredited solar installers, product suppliers and embedded solar finance.
